utterances: where do i find the code
do you have a github repository
answers:
We publish all our code on Github. Have a look at
https://github.com/chatally/chatally

utterances: do you have a discord server
answers:
We do have a Discord server, where you can chat with the maintainers and ask support questions.

https://discord.gg/Sb8ECsQCgr

utterances: where do you get funding from
answers:
ChatAlly has been funded in Round 15 of the Prototype Fund (https://prototypefund.de/project/chatally/).

We have no business model, yet. If you have any ideas or want to cooperate, let us know.

There is a very easy to follow __Getting Started__ guide on our website. You might want to have a look:

https://chatally.org/guides

Of course, WhatsApp is supported. Currently, we support WhatsApp Cloud API with a business account.

Have a closer look at the docs

https://chatally.org/reference/servers/whatsapp-cloud

Signal support is currently being implemented. For updates, have a look at 

https://chatally.org/reference/servers/signal
